titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council, a proclamation. Charles Porter, Coningesby. The King and Queens most excellent Majesties in tender compassion to their loving subjects of this kingdom and in consideration of what they have suffered in the late war ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen's most Excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin the 7th. day of July, 1692.".
Steele notation: Arms 193. Majesties since Ma-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
